name: Shadowed Enigma
description:
In this game, you play as a teacher who gets trapped inside his old abandoned school after dark. But the school isn't completely abandoned, as strange noises and supernatural occurrences suggest that something sinister lurks within. As you explore the dark and eerie corridors of the school, you must solve puzzles, uncover clues, and evade a terrifying monster that can teleport and appears out of nowhere. Your objective is to find a way out of the school, but the path to escape won't be easy as you uncover the dark secrets and hidden horrors that lie within. The game offers a thrilling and heart-pumping experience as you try to survive and escape the clutches of the monster while unravelling the mysteries of the school.

THE GAME MAY STILL HAVE SOME BUGS

Controls:
  • Move: WASD or Gamepad Left Analog
  • Jump: Space Bar or Gamepad A Button
  • Look around: Mouse movement or Gamepad Right Analog
  • Interact: E or Left Mouse Click or Gamepad RT
  • Toggle Sprint: Shift or Gamepad Left Analog Click
  • Back: Escape or Gamepaf B Button
Controls:
  • Marvin Mofeed (Developer and Game Designer)
  • Eddy (Artist and Animator)
  • Melita (Music Composer)
  • Tiago (Music Composer and Sound Designer)
  • Stephen Roe (The Voice Actor)
